value.name: French: Reform and accountability, yes. But St. Louis still needs cops
value.description: St. Louis police have changed how they deal with mentally ill suspects. That's progress. We need accountability, but also cops on the street.

value.name: Man in hospital with serious head injury after attack in Glengormley
value.description: A man is in hospital with a serious head injury after an attack in Glengormley on Saturday night. Police are investigating reports that the 18-year-old was walking with two women on Farmley Road shortly after 8pm when he was set upon by an unknown man.

value.description: Police investigating an alleged sectarian attack on an 18-year-old man in Belfast are appealing for the driver of a car to come forward. The incident is alleged to have occurred shortly after 10.30pm on the Ardoyne Road.

value.name: Ryan Smith
